data.name: Kaby Arena
data.description:
## What Is Kaby Arena (KABY)?
Kaby Arena is a Free-to-play NFT game where everyone can take part in without the hassle of a big initial cost. Kaby Arena employs the Play-to-earn model and rewards players with Kaby tokens through PvE, PvP, tournaments and trading. 
Kaby Arena is a turn-based RPG inspired by Summoners War. The players will assemble a team of heroes to take part in quests and tournaments. Each hero is unique by its appearance, element, attribute and set of skills.

## Who is the team behind Kaby Arena?
Kaby Arena is a joint project between Kaby Games and Ziga Studio
Kaby Games was founded by CEO Nhan Bui, COO Anh Phan and CTO Dung Vu. The team has 10 years of experience in competitive gaming and virtual collectibles trading. 
Ziga Studio specializes in mobile and web games. The company was founded in 2014 by Dung Vu and has created over 15 titles since then.

## What Makes Kaby Arena Unique?
Kaby Arena by its own design gives maximum support for F2P players. Anyone can start playing without any upfront investment, and earn Kaby tokens through our Play-to-earn model. F2P players can mint their non-NFT assets into NFT using Kaby tokens. 
Kaby Arena introduces a mechanism called Crypto War which gives players in-game advantages for predicting the market correctly. The mechanism is incorporated into the gameplay to give incentives to players who do their own research and understand the market. 
Kaby Arena features dynamic ranking and matchmaking system. The game aims to create a competitive environment for players by hosting periodical events and Esport tournaments with token rewards.
